name: Salemates.com
overview: Salemates.com is a social discount marketplace where you can make easy money and score free products. You can register for free, browse a huge inventory, and then share products and your individual Salemate number with friends using share-and-earn tools they provide. Every time your contacts use your Salemate number, you will earn an instant 20% commission in the form of Mate Bucks, and your mates will receive an instant 20% discount on their entire order. Your Mate Bucks can then be used for any product in our marketplace or redeemed for cash. You can even donate Mate Bucks to charity or share them with another member of Salemates.com.
